segments.source_content:
import RemoveGlobalCLI from './\_remove-global-cli.md';
import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs'; import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem'; import constants from '@site/core/TabsConstants';

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_a9b642df

segments.source_content: ## Installing dependencies

translations.zh-hant: ## 安裝依賴套件

segments.source_content: You will need Node, the React Native command line interface, a JDK, and Android Studio.

translations.zh-hant: 您需要安裝 Node、React Native 命令行介面、JDK 以及 Android Studio。

segments.source_content: While you can use any editor of your choice to develop your app, you will need to install Android Studio in order to set up the necessary tooling to build your React Native app for Android.

translations.zh-hant: 雖然您可以使用任何偏好的編輯器開發應用程式，但必須安裝 Android Studio 才能設置建置 React Native Android 應用所需的工具鏈。

segments.source_content: Node

translations.zh-hant: Node

segments.source_content: Follow the [installation instructions for your Linux distribution](https://nodejs.org/en/download/package-manager/) to install Node 18 or newer.

translations.zh-hant: 請根據[您的 Linux 發行版安裝指引](https://nodejs.org/en/download/package-manager/)安裝 Node 18 或更新版本。

segments.source_content: Java Development Kit

translations.zh-hant: Java 開發套件 (JDK)

segments.source_content: React Native currently recommends version 17 of the Java SE Development Kit (JDK). You may encounter problems using higher JDK versions. You may download and install [OpenJDK](https://openjdk.java.net) from [AdoptOpenJDK](https://adoptopenjdk.net/) or your system packager.

translations.zh-hant: React Native 目前推薦使用 Java SE 開發套件 (JDK) 第 17 版。使用更高版本 JDK 可能會遇到問題。您可以從 [AdoptOpenJDK](https://adoptopenjdk.net/) 下載安裝 [OpenJDK](https://openjdk.java.net)，或透過系統套件管理器安裝。

segments.source_content: Android development environment

translations.zh-hant: Android 開發環境

segments.source_content: Setting up your development environment can be somewhat tedious if you're new to Android development. If you're already familiar with Android development, there are a few things you may need to configure. In either case, please make sure to carefully follow the next few steps.

translations.zh-hant: 若您剛接觸 Android 開發，設置開發環境可能會有些繁瑣。若您已有 Android 開發經驗，則可能需要調整部分設定。無論哪種情況，請務必仔細遵循後續步驟。

segments.source_content: 1. Install Android Studio

translations.zh-hant: 1. 安裝 Android Studio

segments.source_content: [Download and install Android Studio](https://developer.android.com/studio/index.html). While on Android Studio installation wizard, make sure the boxes next to all of the following items are checked:

translations.zh-hant: [下載並安裝 Android Studio](https://developer.android.com/studio/index.html)。在安裝精靈中，請確保勾選以下所有項目：

segments.source_content:
- `Android SDK`
- `Android SDK Platform`
- `Android Virtual Device`

translations.zh-hant:
- `Android SDK`
- `Android SDK Platform`
- `Android Virtual Device`

segments.source_content: Then, click "Next" to install all of these components.

translations.zh-hant: 接著點擊「Next」安裝所有元件。

segments.source_content: > If the checkboxes are grayed out, you will have a chance to install these components later on.

translations.zh-hant: > 若勾選框呈灰色不可選狀態，您稍後仍有機會安裝這些元件。

segments.source_content: Once setup has finalized and you're presented with the Welcome screen, proceed to the next step.

translations.zh-hant: 當安裝完成並顯示歡迎畫面時，請繼續下一步。

segments.source_content: 2. Install the Android SDK

translations.zh-hant: 2. 安裝 Android SDK

segments.source_content: Android Studio installs the latest Android SDK by default. Building a React Native app with native code, however, requires the `Android 14 (UpsideDownCake)` SDK in particular. Additional Android SDKs can be installed through the SDK Manager in Android Studio.

translations.zh-hant: Android Studio 預設會安裝最新版 Android SDK。但使用原生程式碼建置 React Native 應用時，需要特定安裝 `Android 14 (UpsideDownCake)` SDK。您可透過 Android Studio 的 SDK 管理器安裝其他 Android SDK 版本。

segments.source_content: To do that, open Android Studio, click on "Configure" button and select "SDK Manager".

translations.zh-hant: 請開啟 Android Studio，點擊「Configure」按鈕並選擇「SDK Manager」。

segments.source_content: > The SDK Manager can also be found within the Android Studio "Settings" dialog, under **Languages & Frameworks** → **Android SDK**.

translations.zh-hant: > 您也可在 Android Studio 的「Settings」對話框中找到 SDK 管理器，路徑為 **Languages & Frameworks** → **Android SDK**。

segments.source_content: Select the "SDK Platforms" tab from within the SDK Manager, then check the box next to "Show Package Details" in the bottom right corner. Look for and expand the `Android 14 (UpsideDownCake)` entry, then make sure the following items are checked:

translations.zh-hant: 在 SDK 管理器中選擇「SDK Platforms」標籤頁，然後勾選右下角的「Show Package Details」。找到並展開 `Android 14 (UpsideDownCake)` 項目，確保以下元件已勾選：

segments.source_content:
- `Android SDK Platform 34`
- `Intel x86 Atom_64 System Image` or `Google APIs Intel x86 Atom System Image`

translations.zh-hant:
- `Android SDK Platform 34`
- `Intel x86 Atom_64 System Image` 或 `Google APIs Intel x86 Atom System Image`

segments.source_content: Next, select the "SDK Tools" tab and check the box next to "Show Package Details" here as well. Look for and expand the "Android SDK Build-Tools" entry, then make sure that `34.0.0` is selected.

translations.zh-hant: 接著切換至「SDK Tools」標籤頁，同樣勾選「Show Package Details」。找到並展開「Android SDK Build-Tools」項目，確保選中 `34.0.0` 版本。

segments.source_content: Finally, click "Apply" to download and install the Android SDK and related build tools.

translations.zh-hant: 最後點擊「Apply」下載並安裝 Android SDK 及相關建置工具。

segments.source_content: 3. Configure the ANDROID_HOME environment variable

translations.zh-hant: 3. 配置 ANDROID_HOME 環境變數

segments.source_content: The React Native tools require some environment variables to be set up in order to build apps with native code.

translations.zh-hant: React Native 工具鏈需要設置特定環境變數才能建置含原生程式碼的應用。

segments.source_content: Add the following lines to your `$HOME/.bash_profile` or `$HOME/.bashrc` (if you are using `zsh` then `~/.zprofile` or `~/.zshrc`) config file:

translations.zh-hant: 請將以下內容加入您的 `$HOME/.bash_profile` 或 `$HOME/.bashrc` 設定檔（若使用 `zsh` 則為 `~/.zprofile` 或 `~/.zshrc`）：

segments.source_content:
```shell
export ANDROID_HOME=$HOME/Android/Sdk
export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/emulator
export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_6d254e09

segments.source_content: > `.bash_profile` is specific to `bash`. If you're using another shell, you will need to edit the appropriate shell-specific config file.

translations.zh-hant: > `.bash_profile` 是 `bash` 專用的設定檔。若使用其他 shell，您需要編輯對應的 shell 專用設定檔。

segments.source_content: Type `source $HOME/.bash_profile` for `bash` or `source $HOME/.zprofile` to load the config into your current shell. Verify that ANDROID_HOME has been set by running `echo $ANDROID_HOME` and the appropriate directories have been added to your path by running `echo $PATH`.

translations.zh-hant: 對於 `bash` 請輸入 `source $HOME/.bash_profile`，或輸入 `source $HOME/.zprofile` 以將設定載入當前 shell。執行 `echo $ANDROID_HOME` 確認 ANDROID_HOME 已設定，並執行 `echo $PATH` 確認正確的目錄已加入路徑中。

segments.source_content: > Please make sure you use the correct Android SDK path. You can find the actual location of the SDK in the Android Studio "Settings" dialog, under **Languages & Frameworks** → **Android SDK**.

translations.zh-hant: > 請務必使用正確的 Android SDK 路徑。您可以在 Android Studio 的「設定」對話框中找到 SDK 的實際位置，路徑為 **Languages & Frameworks** → **Android SDK**。

segments.source_content: Watchman

translations.zh-hant: Watchman

segments.source_content: Follow the [Watchman installation guide](https://facebook.github.io/watchman/docs/install#buildinstall) to compile and install Watchman from source.

translations.zh-hant: 請遵循 [Watchman 安裝指南](https://facebook.github.io/watchman/docs/install#buildinstall) 從原始碼編譯並安裝 Watchman。

segments.source_content: > [Watchman](https://facebook.github.io/watchman/docs/install) is a tool by Facebook for watching changes in the filesystem. It is highly recommended you install it for better performance and increased compatibility in certain edge cases (translation: you may be able to get by without installing this, but your mileage may vary; installing this now may save you from a headache later).

translations.zh-hant: > [Watchman](https://facebook.github.io/watchman/docs/install) 是 Facebook 開發的檔案系統變更監控工具。強烈建議安裝以提升效能並增強特定邊緣案例的相容性（譯註：您或許可以不安裝此工具，但效果可能因情況而異；現在安裝可避免後續潛在問題）。

segments.source_content: React Native Command Line Interface

translations.zh-hant: React Native 命令列介面

segments.source_content: React Native has a built-in command line interface. Rather than install and manage a specific version of the CLI globally, we recommend you access the current version at runtime using `npx`, which ships with Node.js. With `npx react-native <command>`, the current stable version of the CLI will be downloaded and executed at the time the command is run.

translations.zh-hant: React Native 內建命令列介面。與其全域安裝並管理特定版本的 CLI，我們建議透過 Node.js 內建的 `npx` 在執行時存取當前版本。使用 `npx react-native <command>` 時，系統會自動下載並執行當前穩定版的 CLI。

segments.source_content: Creating a new application

translations.zh-hant: 建立新應用程式

segments.source_content: <RemoveGlobalCLI />

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_688f86d6

segments.source_content: React Native has a built-in command line interface, which you can use to generate a new project. You can access it without installing anything globally using `npx`, which ships with Node.js. Let's create a new React Native project called "AwesomeProject":

translations.zh-hant: React Native 內建命令列介面，可用於生成新專案。您無需全域安裝任何套件，直接使用 Node.js 內建的 `npx` 即可存取此功能。以下示範建立名為「AwesomeProject」的新 React Native 專案：

segments.source_content:
```shell
npx react-native@latest init AwesomeProject
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_b73a4a7a

segments.source_content: This is not necessary if you are integrating React Native into an existing application, or if you've installed [Expo](https://docs.expo.dev/bare/installing-expo-modules/) in your project, or if you're adding Android support to an existing React Native project (see [Integration with Existing Apps](integration-with-existing-apps.md)). You can also use a third-party CLI to init your React Native app, such as [Ignite CLI](https://github.com/infinitered/ignite).

translations.zh-hant: 若您要將 React Native 整合至現有應用程式、專案中已安裝 [Expo](https://docs.expo.dev/bare/installing-expo-modules/)，或是為現有 React Native 專案新增 Android 支援（參見 [與現有應用程式整合](integration-with-existing-apps.md)），則無需此步驟。您亦可使用第三方 CLI（如 [Ignite CLI](https://github.com/infinitered/ignite)）初始化 React Native 應用程式。

segments.source_content: [Optional] Using a specific version or template

translations.zh-hant: [選用] 使用特定版本或範本

segments.source_content: If you want to start a new project with a specific React Native version, you can use the `--version` argument:

translations.zh-hant: 若要以特定 React Native 版本建立新專案，可使用 `--version` 參數：

segments.source_content:
```shell
npx react-native@X.XX.X init AwesomeProject --version X.XX.X
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_ec99e704

segments.source_content: You can also start a project with a custom React Native template with the `--template` argument.

translations.zh-hant: 您亦可透過 `--template` 參數使用自訂的 React Native 範本建立專案。

segments.source_content: Preparing the Android device

translations.zh-hant: 準備 Android 裝置

segments.source_content: You will need an Android device to run your React Native Android app. This can be either a physical Android device, or more commonly, you can use an Android Virtual Device which allows you to emulate an Android device on your computer.

translations.zh-hant: 執行 React Native Android 應用程式需準備 Android 裝置，可以是實體 Android 裝置，或更常見的做法是使用 Android 虛擬裝置 (AVD) 在電腦上模擬 Android 裝置。

segments.source_content: Either way, you will need to prepare the device to run Android apps for development.

translations.zh-hant: 無論採用何種方式，均需設定裝置以執行開發用的 Android 應用程式。

segments.source_content: Using a physical device

translations.zh-hant: 使用實體裝置

segments.source_content: If you have a physical Android device, you can use it for development in place of an AVD by plugging it in to your computer using a USB cable and following the instructions [here](running-on-device.md).

translations.zh-hant: 若您擁有實體 Android 裝置，可透過 USB 連接線將其連接至電腦，並依照[此處說明](running-on-device.md)進行設定，即可用於開發以取代 AVD。

segments.source_content: Using a virtual device

translations.zh-hant: 使用虛擬裝置

segments.source_content: If you use Android Studio to open `./AwesomeProject/android`, you can see the list of available Android Virtual Devices (AVDs) by opening the "AVD Manager" from within Android Studio. Look for an icon that looks like this:

translations.zh-hant: 若使用 Android Studio 開啟 `./AwesomeProject/android`，可透過 Android Studio 內的「AVD Manager」查看可用虛擬裝置清單。尋找如下圖示的按鈕：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_ebbb7828

segments.source_content: If you have recently installed Android Studio, you will likely need to [create a new AVD](https://developer.android.com/studio/run/managing-avds.html). Select "Create Virtual Device...", then pick any Phone from the list and click "Next", then select the **UpsideDownCake** API Level 34 image.

translations.zh-hant: 若您近期才安裝 Android Studio，可能需要[建立新 AVD](https://developer.android.com/studio/run/managing-avds.html)。選擇「Create Virtual Device...」後，從清單中任選一款手機並點擊「Next」，接著選取 **UpsideDownCake** API Level 34 映像檔。

segments.source_content: > We recommend configuring [VM acceleration](https://developer.android.com/studio/run/emulator-acceleration.html#vm-linux) on your system to improve performance. Once you've followed those instructions, go back to the AVD Manager.

translations.zh-hant: > 我們建議在您的系統上配置 [VM 加速](https://developer.android.com/studio/run/emulator-acceleration.html#vm-linux)以提升效能。完成這些步驟後，請返回 AVD 管理員。

segments.source_content: Click "Next" then "Finish" to create your AVD. At this point you should be able to click on the green triangle button next to your AVD to launch it, then proceed to the next step.

translations.zh-hant: 點擊「下一步」然後「完成」以創建您的 AVD。此時您應該可以點擊 AVD 旁邊的綠色三角形按鈕來啟動它，接著繼續下一步。

segments.source_content: Running your React Native application

translations.zh-hant: 運行您的 React Native 應用程式

segments.source_content: Step 1: Start Metro

translations.zh-hant: 步驟 1：啟動 Metro

segments.source_content: [**Metro**](https://facebook.github.io/metro/) is the JavaScript build tool for React Native. To start the Metro development server, run the following from your project folder:

translations.zh-hant: [**Metro**](https://facebook.github.io/metro/) 是 React Native 的 JavaScript 建構工具。要啟動 Metro 開發伺服器，請在您的專案資料夾中運行以下指令：

segments.source_content:
<Tabs groupId="package-manager" queryString defaultValue={constants.defaultPackageManager} values={constants.packageManagers}>
<TabItem value="npm">

```shell
npm start
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="yarn">

```shell
yarn start
```

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_349bca41

segments.source_content:
:::note
If you're familiar with web development, Metro is similar to bundlers such as Vite and webpack, but is designed end-to-end for React Native. For instance, Metro uses [Babel](https://babel.dev/) to transform syntax such as JSX into executable JavaScript.
:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note
如果您熟悉網頁開發，Metro 類似於 Vite 和 webpack 等打包工具，但專為 React Native 端到端設計。例如，Metro 使用 [Babel](https://babel.dev/) 將 JSX 等語法轉換為可執行的 JavaScript。
:::

segments.source_content: Step 2: Start your application

translations.zh-hant: 步驟 2：啟動您的應用程式

segments.source_content: Let Metro Bundler run in its own terminal. Open a new terminal inside your React Native project folder. Run the following:

translations.zh-hant: 讓 Metro Bundler 在其專用的終端機中運行。在您的 React Native 專案資料夾中開啟一個新的終端機。運行以下指令：

segments.source_content:
<Tabs groupId="package-manager" queryString defaultValue={constants.defaultPackageManager} values={constants.packageManagers}>
<TabItem value="npm">

```shell
npm run android
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="yarn">

```shell
yarn android
```

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_817eb4a8

segments.source_content: If everything is set up correctly, you should see your new app running in your Android emulator shortly.

translations.zh-hant: 如果一切設置正確，您應該很快就能在 Android 模擬器中看到您的新應用程式運行。

segments.source_content: This is one way to run your app - you can also run it directly from within Android Studio.

translations.zh-hant: 這是運行應用程式的一種方式——您也可以直接從 Android Studio 中運行它。

segments.source_content: > If you can't get this to work, see the [Troubleshooting](troubleshooting.md) page.

translations.zh-hant: > 如果無法正常運行，請參閱 [疑難排解](troubleshooting.md) 頁面。

segments.source_content: Modifying your app

translations.zh-hant: 修改您的應用程式

segments.source_content: Now that you have successfully run the app, let's modify it.

translations.zh-hant: 現在您已成功運行應用程式，讓我們來修改它。

segments.source_content:
- Open `App.tsx` in your text editor of choice and edit some lines.
- Press the <kbd>R</kbd> key twice or select `Reload` from the Dev Menu (<kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>M</kbd>) to see your changes!

translations.zh-hant:
- 在您選擇的文字編輯器中開啟 `App.tsx` 並編輯一些內容。
- 按兩下 <kbd>R</kbd> 鍵或從開發者選單中選擇 `重新載入` (<kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>M</kbd>) 以查看您的變更！

segments.source_content: That's it!
Congratulations! You've successfully run and modified your first React Native app.

translations.zh-hant: 恭喜！您已成功運行並修改了您的第一個 React Native 應用程式。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_b232c140

segments.source_content: Now what?

translations.zh-hant: 接下來呢？

segments.source_content: - If you want to add this new React Native code to an existing application, check out the [Integration guide](integration-with-existing-apps.md).

translations.zh-hant: - 如果您想將這段新的 React Native 代碼添加到現有應用程式中，請查看 [整合指南](integration-with-existing-apps.md)。

segments.source_content: If you're curious to learn more about React Native, check out the [Introduction to React Native](getting-started).

translations.zh-hant: 如果您想了解更多關於 React Native 的資訊，請查看 [React Native 簡介](getting-started)。
